name: A Sound in the Woods
description:
YOU HEAR A NOISE IN THE WOODS

Upon further investigation, everything goes dark. Throughout the game, you must navigate using sounds to escape the forest.

Features

This game has:

 - Audio

 - A monster that chases you

 - Objectives

 - And other stuff I guess

Basically, I had an idea of an audio-only game, where you navigate using sound. The game currently has some lights, but it's mostly sound navigation.

Additional Information

This game was made in 1 day for the SCREAM JAM 2022+1. The jam lasted a week but I had a school trip in the middle of it.  I just cranked the game out in a day because I felt like it. That's pretty much it.

Requirements

Headphones are HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. You need to hear what direction sounds are coming from in order to navigate. That's pretty much it.
